description:
A woman wants a drug to slowly kill her mother-in-law. An old man is terrible to his servants, even when those servants are monsters. A frog from Kyoto and a frog from Osaka visit each other`s cities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Botsubotsu Kiku Kusuri / Bakemonozukai / Kyou no Kaeru, Osaka no Kaeru
The Medicine That Works Here and There / The Monster Master / The Frog of Kyoto, the Frog of Osaka
ぼつぼつ効く薬 / 化け物使い / 京の蛙, 大坂の蛙
